name: Shimmering Christmas Card
description:
Design your own festive Christmas card


Send to family, friends, colleagues who you don't want to faff at the post office queue for... and with the magic of google sheets you can even generate limitless personalisation!


Step 1:

Swap in your own pictures, contact & greeting on the front


Step 2:

Address your recipient and write your message


Step 3:

YOU CAN USE DAVEâ€™S WONDERFUL GOOGLE SHEETS PLUG IN TO GENERATE AS MANY DESIGNS AS YOU LIKE... this means you can generate 300 personalised cards at the click of a button!


Step 4:

Click Sync Google sheet


Step 5:

Send your personalised cards out to your â€˜nice listâ€™.
